feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - API change for OS reinstallation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 10, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

May 22, 22:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our API offer.

This will affect some functionality.

Start time : 10/09/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 10/09/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, API will stop to accept SSH key id for OS reinstallation.
